title: UnitNameGroups
description: A list of unit name groups, each with a name and associated unit names.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the unit name group. For example: Scientist.

unitNames.title: Unit Names
unitNames.description: A list of names that apply to the group. For example: Alan Turing.

items.title: Unit Name
items.description: A unit name that can be assigned to applicable units.
